description: Information related to the networking layer of Substrate

targets.expr:
(
  sum(${metric_namespace}_sub_libp2p_connections_opened_total{direction="in", node=~"${node}"}) by (node) -
  sum(${metric_namespace}_sub_libp2p_connections_closed_total{direction="in", node=~"${node}"}) by (node)
)

# Because `closed_total` can be null, this serves as fallback
or on(node) sum(${metric_namespace}_sub_libp2p_connections_opened_total{direction="in", node=~"${node}"}) by (node)

(
  sum(${metric_namespace}_sub_libp2p_connections_opened_total{direction="out", node=~"${node}"}) by (node) -
  sum(${metric_namespace}_sub_libp2p_connections_closed_total{direction="out", node=~"${node}"}) by (node)
)

# Because `closed_total` can be null, this serves as fallback
or on(node) sum(${metric_namespace}_sub_libp2p_connections_opened_total{direction="out", node=~"${node}"}) by (node)

panels.title: Percentage of peers for which we have more than one connection open
Total sizes of notifications waiting to be delivered to the rest of Substrate
Average size of sent and received notifications
99th percentile of size of sent and received notifications
GrandPa messages received from the network, and action

title: Substrate - Networking
